title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report parameter.
2. Set the display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc".
4. Set "aa" as the default value and click OK.
5. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
6. Modify the default value from "aa" to "aaa" and click OK.
7. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
8. Verify that the default value is still set to "aaa".
